lines: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe57948>

lines: Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe56cc8>

lines: The essence of life is not in the great victories and grand failures, but in the simple joys.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe56548>

lines: The joy of giving is the greatest joy of life.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe55c88>

lines: Happiness—not in another place, but this place... not for another hour, but for this hour.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe55508>

lines: Joy is the kind of happiness that doesn’t depend on what happens.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe55008>

lines: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe54b08>

lines: Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe52e48>

lines: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe52948>

lines: When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe52088>

lines: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe51908>

lines: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe50c88>

lines: Practice like you’ve never won. Play like you’ve never lost.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbe50788>

lines: Practice is the best of all instructors.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeafc88>

lines: Talent is a pursued interest. Anything that you’re willing to practice, you can do.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeaf508>

lines: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is practice.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeaf008>

lines: Practice creates confidence. Confidence empowers you.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeae888>

lines: No one has ever become poor by giving.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeae108>

lines: The more generous we are, the more joyous we become.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbead988>

lines: Sometimes when we are generous in small, barely detectable ways it can change someone else's life forever.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbead208>

lines: The greatest gift you ever give is your honest self.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeac308>

lines: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeaa788>

lines: The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbeaa288>

lines: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea9b08>

lines: Showing gratitude is one of the simplest yet most powerful things humans can do for each other.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea8988>

lines: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea8208>

lines: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea76c8>

lines: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. Today is a gift.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea6408>

lines: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment until it becomes a memory.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea58c8>

lines: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea4ec8>

lines: Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea44c8>

lines: What counts can’t always be counted; what can be counted doesn’t always count.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea3e88>

lines: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: <Author:0x00007fcdfbea3488>
